summary: A pair of psychotic hoodlums and an equally demented nymphomaniac woman terrorize two young girls on a train trip from Germany to Italy.
cast: Flavio Bucci|Macha Méril|Gianfranco De Grassi|Enrico Maria Salerno|Marina Berti|Franco Fabrizi|Irene Miracle|Laura D'Angelo|Umberto Amambrini|Kay Beal|Francesco D'Adda|Richard Davis|Giovanni Di Benedetto|Dalila Di Lazzaro|Daniele Dublino|Patty Edwards|Dante Fioretti|Selan Karay|Norma Knight|Rita Moscatelli|Delbert Moss|Karl-Heinz Peters|Alberto Squillante|Anna Taddei
title: Violación en el último tren de la noche
